title: Yosemite National Park: Field Trips
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Parks as Classrooms     Field Trips                 Field Trips          Consider connecting your students to the ultimate classroom. Yosemite National Park features an amazing array of learning opportunities. In this section, you will find several options and planning resources to help you coordinate a field trip to Yosemiteâ€”whether you plan on attending a Parks As Classrooms ranger program, experiencing the Environmental Living Program, designing a self-guiding visit, or are looking for information on a wide range of program options, this section of the website can help guide you. Of course, if you have any questions, email us or call us at 209/375-9503.
